body: Hugo from Serbolivianoes [es] posted a video interview with blogger [es] Patricia Vargas (@arquitecta on Twitter), "one of the first bloggers and one of the most influential Twitter users in Bolivia." In the interview she talks about the local and international blogosphere, as well as the Bolivian twittersphere.
